Please use the link below to configure your copy of the Piwigo Client app with the server Uri, username, and password to get you started.\n\n %1$s
Please select a destination for the link.\n\n\'This app\' will create a new profile in this app with these credentials allowing you to test the feature

Would you like to create a deep link that can be used to configure a copy of this app with the server details?

The idea is to make it easier for someone to get started.

This feature is not available in the free version.
The current deep link will not have a password. If you wish to add the password, you must set a new password for this user.\n\nCreate the deep link without a password?
